artist: Artist: Fly NYC , et al.; Publisher: Arsenal Pulp Press, Vancouver

description: Perfect bound volume, photomechanical illustration of faceless figure splicing Shakespeare book, with text, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 176 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: What Right? Graphic Interpretations Against Censorship
